backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining user profiles, templates, bios, subscriptions, and storage/authorization mixins, plus system template seeds and helper ID generators.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module adding pending and confirmed subscription maps while preserving existing user profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files and their recent updates across pages, components, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining color variables, dark mode tokens, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app routing setup with auth/registration guards, layout, and page routes.
frontend/src/components/BioFormulaHelper: UI helper card providing a 4-part bio writing formula with expandable details and an insert action.
frontend/src/components/BrandHeader.tsx: Header component handling navigation, authentication, mobile menu, and conditional pro-user upload link.
frontend/src/components/LinksEditor.tsx: Editable list UI for adding, updating, and removing link items.
frontend/src/components/PaymentQrUploade: Handles image upload for a payment QR code with progress, preview, and removal.
frontend/src/components/SocialHandlesEdi: Editor for managing social handle entries with platform selection and CRUD controls.
frontend/src/components/TemplateBadge.ts: Renders a badge with predefined label and styles based on template variant.
frontend/src/components/TemplateCard.tsx: Displays a template preview card with image, metadata, optional badge, and navigation button.
frontend/src/constants/categories.ts: Defines a constant list of template category strings and a corresponding type.
frontend/src/data/seedTemplates.ts: Provides seed template data with metadata, thumbnails, and encoded editable content for initial population.
frontend/src/data/topInfluencers.ts: Defines an Influencer interface and exports a curated list of influencer profiles grouped by category.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, templates, and subscription data using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind-based styles, CSS variables, dark mode, and screenshot protection rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Implements the subscription checkout UI with UPI payment flows and triggers subscription activation through backend mutations.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page that handles login, redirects authenticated users to templates, and displays hero and value sections.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Pricing page showing Premium and Pro plans, gating messages, and plan selection navigation.
frontend/src/pages/SharedBioPage.tsx: Public page to view a shared bio, with loading/error states and sections for socials and links.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Signup form for creating a user profile, submitting data via mutation, and navigating to templates on success.
frontend/src/pages/TemplateDetailPage.ts: Displays template details, influencer examples, and supports AI-generated bio content while blocking screenshots.
frontend/src/pages/TemplateEditorPage.ts: Editor for customizing a template’s bio, links, and socials, initializing fields from editable content and saving new bio pages.
frontend/src/pages/TemplateGalleryPage.t: Renders the template gallery with category filters, loading states, error alerts, and badge mapping for certain templates.
frontend/src/pages/UploadTemplatePage.ts: Implements the Pro‑gated template upload form with thumbnail upload, validation, and submission to the template upload API.
frontend/src/utils/upi.ts: Provides utilities to generate UPI payment links, trigger Google Pay or PhonePe intents, and copy text to clipboard.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, typography, and container settings for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, architecture, subscription flow, known issues, and generated template thumbnail assets.
